item.title: Pivot tables in R - looking at police data
item.description: Looking at police data using Tidyverse tools The Tidyverse tools are one of my favourite things and made my R coding experience much simpler. Most of the things I’ll be posting will use them in one way or another. We’re going to find out what happens when someone reports a stolen bicycle - a friend seems to believe the police do nothing, so let’s investigate what actuall happens. Downloading the data I’ve downloaded a month’s worth of data for South Wales Police from data.
